Trader Mailland:

You must have a good eye for quality, since you stopped in here -- mark my words, too many adventurers these days choose accessories based solely on appearance. With that in mind, I'd steer clear of that Human woman's accessory shop if I were you. They say she keeps the good items for herself. That's not the way we do business here!
Buy/Sell/Refund.
Buy/Sell/Refund Common Items.
Ask about the local lord and tax rate.
